languages.text: {n}Мужчина изображает широкую улыбку, но затем, спохватившись, снова натягивает хмурое выражение.{/n} "Прошу вас. Кхм. Давайте поговорим позже. Капеллан вот-вот начнет церемонию..."
{n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина изображает широкую улыбку, но затем, спохватившись, снова натягивает хмурое выражение.{/n} "Прошу вас. Кхм. Давайте поговорим позже. Капеллан вот-вот начнет церемонию..."

traits.locale_text: {n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin the ceremony..."
{n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin the ceremony..."
{n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."
{n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."
{n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."

languages.text: {n}他露出了灿烂的笑容，但随后便停了下来，立刻再次皱起了眉头。{/n}“请进吧，咳咳。咱们可以稍后再谈，牧师马上就要开始致辞了……”
languages.original_text: {n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."

traits.locale_text: {n}他露出了灿烂的笑容，但随后便停了下来，立刻再次皱起了眉头。{/n}“请进吧，咳咳。咱们可以稍后再谈，牧师马上就要开始致辞了……”

languages.text: {n}Te muestra una amplia sonrisa, pero al momento se contiene y vuelve a fruncir el ceño.{/n} «Por favor. Ejem. Podemos hablar más tarde. Capellán está a punto de empezar...».
languages.original_text: {n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te muestra una amplia sonrisa, pero al momento se contiene y vuelve a fruncir el ceño.{/n} «Por favor. Ejem. Podemos hablar más tarde. Capellán está a punto de empezar...».

languages.text: {n}彼はにっこりと笑ってみせたが、それにハッと気づきすぐに顔をしかめた。{/n}「どうぞ。コホン。後ほどふたりでお話しましょう。まもなく教戒官のお話しがはじまります」
languages.original_text: {n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はにっこりと笑ってみせたが、それにハッと気づきすぐに顔をしかめた。{/n}「どうぞ。コホン。後ほどふたりでお話しましょう。まもなく教戒官のお話しがはじまります」

languages.text: {n}Er lächelt breit, fängt sich aber rasch und setzt wieder ein missmutiges Gesicht auf.{/n} "Bitte! Ähem. Wir können später reden. Ordenspriester wird gleich beginnen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lächelt breit, fängt sich aber rasch und setzt wieder ein missmutiges Gesicht auf.{/n} "Bitte! Ähem. Wir können später reden. Ordenspriester wird gleich beginnen ..."

languages.text: {n}Il affiche un large sourire avant de se ressaisir et de froncer à nouveau les sourcils.{/n} « Je vous en prie. Hum. Nous parlerons plus tard, Chapelain est sur le point de commencer... »
languages.original_text: {n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il affiche un large sourire avant de se ressaisir et de froncer à nouveau les sourcils.{/n} « Je vous en prie. Hum. Nous parlerons plus tard, Chapelain est sur le point de commencer... »

languages.text: {n}Adamın yüzüne kocaman bir gülümseme yayılıyor ama ne yaptığının farkına varıp hızlıca yine kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Buyurun. Öhöm. Daha sonra konuşuruz. Papazın konuşması başlamak üzere."
languages.original_text: {n}He puts on a broad smile, but then catches himself and quickly frowns once more.{/n} "Please. Ahem. We can talk later. Chaplain is about to begin..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzünü kocaman bir gülümseme kaplıyor ama sonra hemen ne yaptığını fark edip hızlıca kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Buyurun. Öhöm. Daha sonra konuşuruz. Papaz başlamak üzere."
